Name: Vinnies

Review Text: Delicious breakfast! Breakfast all hours because it's SO GOOD. We walked here just for this place. The staff is super friendly and helpful, and there are great (and healthy!) choices. Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Vinnies is a nice cafe located along Haarlemmerstraat offering healthy and tasty breakfasts. Opening hours are 7.30am to 5pm daily. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: We went here for breakfast. Friendly service from the waiting staff. Great quality food at reasonable prices. I got the shakeshuka avocado toast and added poached eggs to it. My partner had the Mexican eggs. Expect to pay about 11 euros for a meal. Cute interior. Clean bathrooms. I would go back and I‚Äôd recommend to others.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Cute spot for breakfast with plenty of good healthy options. Not to mention one of the few places in the area that is open early. Which when you have jetlag is a super bonus as most places don‚Äôt open til 9. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinnies

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Lovely cafe with really good sandwiches, soups. Simple ingredients but great quality. Staff is friendly. Plus : free wifi, early opening (7:30), and early birds prices between 7:30 and 9:00 (1‚Ç¨ expresso and 2‚Ç¨ cappu or latte). Love this place.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: This place has an excellent vibe. filled up equally with both tourists and locals. It gave an impression that its going to be great and it indeed turned out to be great. Food was excellent and so was the service. All high quality, ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Great place. Great atmosphere and the personnel is very kind. The food is delicious and the place is close to Amsterdam Central Station. We enjoyed our time there.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text:
What a lovely surprise this place proved to be. Beautiful soft poached eggs on fluffy fresh brioche, with a side of salad. Croissants that were buttery and perfectly flaky. Great (if rather pricey) organic drinks. Good quality coffee.
We were all impressed.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Very good coffee and breakfast.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: The best bread in Amsterdam, hands down. Had a lovely shaskhuka to go with it. Staff is delightful and the upstairs seating area is nice and relaxed especially compared with the madhouse the street has become. Highly recommended

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: If you‚Äôre Australian and looking for good coffee in Amsterdam come here! I had a flat white made with oat milk, and the granola with coconut yogurt. Both were really good. Nice casual setting and friendly service.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Absolutely divine. Healthy & delicious. Highly recommend.

Name: Vinnies

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Wonderful lunch!  Very fresh ingredients.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: The coffee was good, and it's a quaint spot. Met with two friends over lunch and was able to find seating with ease. My only "complaint" was the Reuben sandwich, which tasted fine, wasn't really a Reuben (wrong bread, no Russian dressing ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Vinnie's is one of the best places in Amsterdam for an all day lunch and breakfast menu as well as great coffee. The small team serves a diverse menu with great vegetarian and healthy options. The perfect place to visit by yourself or with friends.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Fabulous place for breakfast or lunch, with friendly, helpful staff. Varied menu (including lactose- and gluten-free items) of eggs, sandwiches, salads, fantastic roasted eggplant/aubergine and sweets (to close the palette of course!). ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Great food, good sized portion. Nice taste in coffee beans, seating area is situated upstairs with a nice aesthetic. Would recommend

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Loved the gluten free food! The interior design was very aesthetic and related. We really enjoyed our meals.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Cozy environment. Friendly staff (smiles from the guy at bar is very welcoming gesture) and fresh and tasty food. Everything seems to be organic and made from scratch. Delicious coffee too.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Quaint and cozy, much like the rest of Amsterdam. A relaxing ambiance in a functioning environment. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinnies
Review Text:
A very good breakfast in Amsterdam. No wait, a peaceful place with good music and nice staff. The coffee is very good and they have a nice veggie breakfast with advocado toast.
I definitely recommend it.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Good coffee, lovely staff and cosy environment. 3 Stars cause they should improve their brownie (very very dry and too sweet): it was made of almond flower (= almost impossible to make it not smooth and creamy...). ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Waw. Cosy hidden gem in Haarlemmerstraat. Very friendly staff and the food is so tasty. A lot a non-traditional combinations and some vegan options. I ate te Omega 3 breakfast, which was delicious. Quite small so seating is limited. Will definitely go back there!

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Friendly staff that are happy to provide an English menu. We had the omega 3 breakfast and truffle scrambled eggs. Food and coffee was delicious. Thank you :)

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: On a early Sunday afternoon, while the rest of Amsterdam was busy filling their reservation list for brunch, Vinnies welcomes me straight in. The small but cosy and warm place served me some delicious shakshuka, a good ol‚Äô cappuccino and ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: A real breath of fresh air compared to the other cafes in Amsterdam. Literally. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The food was fresh healthy and delicious. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Brunch&Breakfast_friendly Amsterdam caf√© with an impressive breakfast and brunch selection. The roasted eggplant dish is dressed in a yogurt-lime sauce and pomegranate, served with bread and a green salad. Their salad bar offerings are pleaseing and the fruit is fresh and seasonal.

Review Text: Lovely little cafe with great food and very kind staff! Not too much space, so better suitable for a couple than for a big group of friends.

Name: Vinnies

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Amazing breakfast items! Try their eggplant and buttermilk sauce or scrambled eggs with herbs. Loved them! Great coffee, too!
